scenario: Alice received the following amounts during the year: Interest on Bank Account: $32,987.89, Gambling Winnings: $24,892.37, Life Insurance Proceeds (Death): $1,903.37, Dividends: $29,469.27.
question: Calculate Alice's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $87,349.53.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items (Gifts, Loans, etc.).
